title: Add --requires flag to tk update
description:
Add --requires flag to the update command

Usage: tk update <id> --requires approval|review|content
       tk update <id> --requires=  (clear the requires field)

Behavior:
- Set or clear the requires field on existing tick
- Validate value is one of: approval, review, content, or empty
- Empty value clears the field (removes gate)

Implementation:
- Add -requires and --requires flags to update FlagSet
- Use optionalString pattern for nullable field
- --requires= (empty) clears the field
- Validate enum value before updating

Note: Clearing requires is valid - human may decide gate is no longer needed.
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] --requires flag added to update command
- [ ] Valid values accepted (approval, review, content)
- [ ] Empty value clears the field
- [ ] Invalid values rejected with error
- [ ] Field saved correctly to tick JSON
closed_reason: Added --requires and -r flags to update command using optionalString pattern. Validates against approval/review/content enum values; empty value clears the field. Added comprehensive tests covering all enum values, clearing, invalid values, and short flag.
